member.name: WS_XML_BASE64_TEXT
member.summary: Represents base64 encoded data. (for example, the three bytes { 0, 0, 0 } represent the text "AAAA".)

member.name: WS_XML_BASE64_TEXT.text
member.summary: The base type for all types that derive from .

member.name: WS_XML_BASE64_TEXT.length
member.summary: The length of the bytes of data.
